desc: We are one of the leading manufacturers of reflective and high visibility products in the sporting goods sector. We are an authorised converter of 3M Scotchlite Reflective Material and have a long-standing relationship with 3M. 3M is the industry leader for reflective materials.

layout.text: Using 3M Scotchlite™, we strive to create innovative reflective products and high-performance apparel for workers, cyclists, walkers and children. No matter the weather, no matter your journey - stay visible with Salzmann.
